title: Entertainment
shortDescription: Immersive audio and visual experiences in every room.
subtitle: Immersive Audio & Video
introTitle: Cinema-quality experiences in the comfort of your home.
introText: From dedicated home theaters to whole-home audio distribution, we deliver crystal-clear sound and stunning visuals. Enjoy your favorite movies, music, and sports with technology that rivals the best commercial venues.

featureSections.title: Whole-Home Audio
featureSections.description: Stream music to every room in the house, with discreet architectural speakers that blend into your decor.

featureSections.title: Dedicated Home Cinema
featureSections.description: Experience movies as the director intended with 4K laser projection, Dolby Atmos sound, and custom acoustical treatment.

featureSections.title: Media Distribution
featureSections.description: Centralize your video sources and watch anything on any TV in the house, instantly.
